inclusion.criterion: Serum total bilirubin =< 1.5 X upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of myeloma for which autologous stem cell transplant is being considered
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease of multiple myeloma at the time of baseline values for disease assessment as defined by at least one of the following:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: >= 200 mg of monoclonal protein in the urine on 24 hour electrophoresis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (PS) 0, 1 or 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Recovered from non-hematological toxicity of previous chemotherapy (excludes grade 1 neurotoxicity)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Voluntary written informed consent before performance of any study-related procedure not part of normal medical care, with the understanding that consent may be withdrawn by the subject at any time without prejudice to future medical care
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior autologous or allogeneic bone marrow/peripheral blood stem cell transplant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than two prior regimens for therapy of MM
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction within 6 months prior to enrollment, or has New York Heart Association (NYHA) class III or IV heart failure, uncontrolled angina, severe uncontrolled ventricular arrhythmias, or electrocardiographic evidence of acute ischemia or active conduction system abnormalities
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Seroreactivity for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), human T-cell lymphotrophic virus (HTLV) I or II, hepatitis B virus (HBV), hepatitis C virus (HCV)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and represents with malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching.
